00001 package newtonERP.viewers.secondStep;
00002 
00003 import java.util.Hashtable;
00004 
00005 import modules.userRightModule.UserRightModule;
00006 import newtonERP.common.ActionLink;
00007 import newtonERP.common.ListModule;
00008 import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;
00009 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00010 
00016 public class ButtonLinkViewer
00017 {
00024         public static String getHtmlCode(ActionLink actionLink,
00025                         AbstractEntity entity)
00026         {
00027                 String html = "";
00028                 int balloonDivId = LinkViewer.getNextBalloonDivId();
00029 
00030                 if (isPermissionAllowed(actionLink))
00031                 {
00032 
00033                         String onClickConfirm = "";
00034 
00035                         if (actionLink.isConfirm())
00036                         {
00037                                 if (entity != null)
00038                                         onClickConfirm = getOnClickConfirm(actionLink.getName(),
00039                                                         entity.getSystemName(),
00040                                                         ((AbstractOrmEntity) entity)
00041                                                                         .getNaturalKeyDescription());
00042                                 else
00043                                         onClickConfirm = getOnClickConfirm(actionLink.getName());
00044                         }
00045 
00046                         html += "<ins>";
00047 
00048                         html += "<form method='get' action='" + actionLink.getUrl() + "'>";
00049 
00050                         html += "<div>";
00051 
00052                         Hashtable<String, String> param = actionLink.getParameters(entity);
00053                         for (String key : param.keySet())
00054                         {
00055                                 html += "<input type='hidden' name='" + key + "' value='"
00056                                                 + param.get(key) + "' />";
00057                         }
00058                         html += "<input onmouseover='document.getElementById(\"balloon"
00059                                         + balloonDivId
00060                                         + "\").style.visibility=\"visible\"' onmouseout='document.getElementById(\"balloon"
00061                                         + balloonDivId
00062                                         + "\").style.visibility=\"hidden\"' class='submitButton' type='submit' "
00063                                         + onClickConfirm + " value=\"" + actionLink.getName()
00064                                         + "\" />";
00065 
00066                         html += "</div>";
00067 
00068                         html += "</form>";
00069 
00070                         html += "</ins>";
00071 
00072                         html += HelpViewer.getHtmlCode(actionLink, balloonDivId);
00073                 }
00074                 else
00075                 {
00076                         // html += "<i style=\"font-size:8px\">" + actionLink.getName()
00077                         // + "</i>";
00078                 }
00079 
00080                 return html;
00081         }
00082 
00083         private static boolean isPermissionAllowed(ActionLink actionLink)
00084 
00085         {
00086                 UserRightModule userRightModule = (UserRightModule) ListModule
00087                                 .getModule("UserRightModule");
00088 
00089                 return userRightModule.isPermissionAllowed(actionLink);
00090         }
00091 
00096         public static String getHtmlCode(ActionLink actionLink)
00097         {
00098                 return getHtmlCode(actionLink, null);
00099         }
00100 
00101         private static String getOnClickConfirm(String actionName,
00102                         String entityTypeName, String value)
00103         {
00104                 String html = "";
00105 
00106                 html += "onclick='return confirm(\"Voulez-vous vraiment ";
00107                 html += actionName + " ";
00108                 html += entityTypeName;
00109                 html += " " + value;
00110                 html += "?\")";
00111 
00112                 html += "'";
00113 
00114                 return html;
00115         }
00116 
00117         private static String getOnClickConfirm(String actionName)
00118         {
00119                 String html = "";
00120 
00121                 html += "onclick='return confirm(\"Voulez-vous vraiment ";
00122                 html += actionName;
00123                 html += "?\")";
00124 
00125                 html += "'";
00126 
00127                 return html;
00128         }
00129 }
